author: cms-sw
body:
This PR added two new root tools
- HistPainter
- Imt
CMSSW UBSAN IBs failed to build due to missing linkage to HistPainter library. We propose to add these tools and then update cmssw/CondCore/SiStripPlugins/plugins to depend on HistPainter
title: added new root tools for histpainter and imt
